p: Solid rosin-based chain extender for polyurethanes can be synthesized from rosin-maleimidodicarboxylic acid, thionyl chloride and ethylene glycol, according to Scheme 49, and using such separation methods as vacuum distillation, washing and evaporation [ 186]. Its application in shape memory polyurethanes improves shape recovery at >1000% strain up to 96% [ 186].
